Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: this  a  good  flat  screen  for  the  money.  good  color  and  nice picture.I  would  remoned  it  to  anyone that  is  wanting to  enlarge  there  monitor i  will  probly  by a  few  more  in the furture

ProductInfo.Features:
19"Class (18.5" Diagonal) LED LCD HDTV
Wide screen 16:9 Aspect Ratio
Native Panel Resolution: 1366 x 768 pixels
Integrated Digital Clear QAM /ATSC + Analog NTSC Tuner
Picture Settings: Brightness, Sharpness, Contrast, Color, Tint, Color Temp, Backlight
ProductInfo.Name: Sanyo 19in. LCD 720P 60HZ
